CustomField.formula:
"Name : " + Name + br() +br() + "Address : " & BR() & if(LEN(BillingStreet)>0, BillingStreet& " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN(BillingCity)>0,BillingCity& ", " , "" )& if(LEN(BillingState)>0, BillingState& " " , "" )& if(LEN(BillingPostalCode)>0,BillingPostalCode,"") & BR() & If(LEN(BillingCountry) >0,BillingCountry,"")
+ br() + br() + "Company Registration Number: " + Company_registration_number__c + br() +br() + "Insurer Company Reference Number: " + Insurer_Company_Reference_Number__c
CustomField.label: Buyer check text
